name: MasktheTruth
description:
WASD or Arrow keys and Space to run faster

Goal: Collect 150 candies.

There are secrets that get you extra candy, so check out the haunted house, the school, or soccer field. Maybe go door to door trick or treating. Just overall enjoy the little neighborhood and watch-out for the inevitable drunk Halloween driver!

Story: You ate all of your sisters Halloween candy. Quickly trick or treat to replace the stolen candy! Hide the truth.

This game turned into a bit of a diorama of sorts. Please explore and enjoy. Happy Halloween!


Assets

PolyPerfect - paid asset

JMO assets - free asset

Customizable Skybox - free asset
